metadata.title: CVE-2013-4515 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The bcm_char_ioctl function in drivers/staging/bcm/Bcmchar.c in the Linuxkernel before 3.12 does not initialize a certain data structure, whichallows local users to obtain sensitive information from kernel memory viaan IOCTL_BCM_GET_DEVICE_DRIVER_INFO ioctl call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4515` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
